item.description:
InSpectres is the nation's first fully licensed and insured Supernatural Investigation and Elimination Service.

And the Main Office is starting a franchise near you!

InSpectres is a comedy/horror game loosely based on the GhostBusters movies and reality TV shows like COPS and The Real World. The mechanics are fast, simple, and include rich opportunities for player narration. We'll whip up a franchise, conduct a brief interview process to hire the PCs, and then tackle our first client and whatever problem he/she/it has.

"Because it's not just a vampiric infestation, it's YOUR vampiric infestation!"

This is the November installment of our series of one-shot indie RPG experiences to be offered monthly over the course of 2010. Each month will feature a different GM running a new game. This month's GM is Tresi.

Got a game on your shelf that you've been itching to run, but your regular group just isn't interested? Why not run it for us at the Role-Playing Fellowship of Greater Boston! We want to continue running one-shot games into 2011, and you can help!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the table with the complementary marshmellows.
